BaseTokenNotSettled().notice: Thrown when a base token is not netted out after a lock

LockedBy(address).notice: Thrown when the caller is not the current locker

NoCFMMLiquidityError().notice: Thrown when the available liquidity is not enough to withdraw

OutOfRangeError().notice: Thrown when the LP position is out of range

QuoteTokenNotSettled().notice: Thrown when a quote token is not netted out after a lock

SqrtAssetCanNotCoverBorrow().notice: Thrown when the supply of 2*squart can not cover borrow
